markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bitter](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1258)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 18</row>

**Price** 135 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

While you wear this acrid armor, any creature that [Engulfs](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=14) you or [Swallows you Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35) is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34); if it spends an action retching to reduce the sickened condition, you can attempt to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) as a reaction.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Bitter
